sourceQuestion: カミナリの音キキわあーっ
activeQuestion: カミナリの音キキわあーっ
sourceComments:
Nothing is said on this card, but if you read Japanese subtitles, you sometimes stumble over "xxx no oto" which means: The sound of xxx, "kaminari" in this case. Kiki, the protagonist of this anime, is flying through a thunderstorm and screams.

kaminari: lightning, thunder
This is frequent in anime, but mostly for describing the sound that's being heard. I just wanted to mention this, you can suspend this card...
reading: かみなり の おと きき わ あー っ

parsingResult.sentence: カミナリの音キキわあーっ
